top.title: Trump says US needs to 'own' Greenland to prevent Russia and China from taking it
top.summary: We will do it "the easy way" or "the hard way", he said, but Denmark says the territory is not for sale.

top.title: Greenlanders unnerved as they find themselves in geopolitical storm
top.summary: Islanders want a bigger say in their ties with Denmark, but also on the world stage too.

top.title: Iran leader says protesters are vandals trying to please Trump
top.summary: The largest demonstrations in years have left at least 48 protesters dead, human rights groups say. Trump told reporters on Friday that Iran was in "big trouble'.

top.title: X could face UK ban over deepfakes, minister says
top.summary: It comes after government urged Ofcom to use all its powers – up to and including an effective ban – against X.

top.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Health to review your medical records
top.summary: The firm says its chatbot sees health and wellbeing questions from 230 million people every week.

top.title: Government accused of dragging its heels on deepfake law over Grok AI
top.summary: The End Violence Against Women Coalition said it had been a year since the inital law was suggested
